name: Carpentangle - Demastered
description:
Fix leaks before your ship sinks in this simple game combining match-3 like mechanics and packing.

Played best with mouse on desktop, but touch controls are passable, once you figure out the basics.

Best played in full-screen or on official site (uses full window).

Source code available on GitHub.

Note: This is a black & white "demaster" of Carpentangle which was made for another overlapping Game Jam, Ludum Dare 50.
